categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems military bases

nodes.text: The Anaxes Separatist Security Outpost was constructed on the planet Anaxes and used by the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Battle of Anaxes during the Clone Wars. Clone Force 99 and members of the 501st Legion briefly took control of the outpost during the battle as part of their mission to infiltrate the Cyber Center. A platoon of droids later investigated it due to the clone attack.
